#summary Reading directions to learn OntoUML and start modeling

= OntoUML Study Guide =

To learn about some fundamental concepts related to the "Ontology World" e about ontology-driven conceptual modeling, we suggest the papers below: 

http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/FAIA.pdf
http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/BalticDB&IS.pdf
http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/EMMSAD@CAISE09.pdf
http://www.researchgate.net/publication/220259945_Do_Ontological_Deficiencies_in_Modeling_Grammars_Matter
http://www.nemo.inf.ufes.br/files/separating_ontological_and_information_modeling_concerns_towards_a_two_level_model_driven_approach_2012.pdf

For a complete description of UFO-A and OntoUML, read the "OntoUML Bible":
[http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/OFSCM.pdf Ontological Foundations for Structural Conceptual Models]

For a "softer" introduction, we recommend the theoretical background chapters of a the thesis:

[http://www.inf.ufes.br/~rguizzardi/OEO/dissertacao-Veruska.pdf]
[https://www.researchgate.net/publication/268220197_Ontology_Validation_for_Managers]
[https://rcarraretto.googlecode.com/files/Carraretto2012MSc.pdf]

Para ler sobre partes específicas de UFO, sugiro os seguintes artigos:

http://doc.utwente.nl/49866/1/WPI.pdf

Roles, Relators and Qua Individuals
http://www.inf.ufes.br/~gguizzardi/quaEntities.pdf
http://www.irit.fr/publis/LILAC/MGVBF-rolesAAAI05.pdf

Qualities
